name: Rescue Teddy Beta
description:
We are a group of students  in game development, this time we bring you "Rescue Teddy" a game where you play as Timmy, you have to get your best friend, teddy, back from your nightmares.

You can enjoy it with keyboard and mouse or with an Xbox controller!

We hope you enjoy the game as much as we enjoy making it!

Leave a comment! You can help us improve the game!
